titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Foundation records, Decorations, SG 19.1 FA1779

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:14:59 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Foundation records, Decorations, SG 19.1

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of awards, memorabilia, artwork, certificates, plaques and other objects.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged primarily by a alphanumeric number that was arbitrarily assigned to each object as the material was received by the Foundation.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Rockefeller Foundation has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.
